Package org.sat4j.sat

Class Launcher

java.lang.Object
org.sat4j.AbstractLauncher
org.sat4j.sat.Launcher
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, org.sat4j.specs.ILogAble
public class Launcher extends org.sat4j.AbstractLauncher implements org.sat4j.specs.ILogAble
This class is used to launch the SAT solvers from the command line. It is compliant with the SAT competition (www.satcompetition.org) I/O format. The launcher is to be used as follows: 
                [solvername] filename [key=value]*
If no solver name is given, then the default solver of the solver factory is used (@see org.sat4j.core.ASolverFactory#defaultSolver()). This class allows to solve sat, pb and maxsat problems.
Since:
2.3.3
Author:
sroussel
See Also:
Serialized Form
